content: get ready for sunny days with our summer sun hat crochet pattern this easy-level pattern is perfect for crocheters of all skill levels from beginners to seasoned pros the pattern includes sizes for children babies toddlers teens and adults ensuring that everyone can enjoy a stylish hat this summer worked in the round with a seamless construction this hat features a beautiful mesh design that is both breathable and fashionable the pattern includes detailed written instructions and a photo tutorial to guide you through each step using i love this cotton yarn from hobby lobby this hat is not only soft and comfortable but also easy to care for grab your hook and start crocheting your summer sun hat today **unique features-** includes sizes for children babies toddlers teens and adults seamless construction for a polished finish breathable mesh design for summer comfort detailed written instructions and photo tutorial for easy crafting **materials needed-** yarn i love this cotton by hobby lobby aran weight 8 wpi - 50-100 yards 45 72-91 44 meters required - hook us size 6 0 4mm - tapestry needle for weaving in ends hook 4mm us size 6 0 gauges 3 stitches x 2 row = 1 inches in double_crochet 3 stitches by 2 row = 1 inches in double_crochet
